name: ChameleonAI "RPG" Mix
description:
All preview images were made before pruning, but it should not reduce quality of generated images!

Form for requests.

I also sometimes do polls on my Patreon for the next LORA (no payment required).

With this mix I wanted to have a model that is mainly focused on anime style images.
I wanted to have a Model that stays close to my other mix in terms of style while improving it a bit on the rpg site of things. It still struggles quite a bit for non humanoids, but I've managed to get some really pretty stuff out of it :)

My settings:

Using Hires.fix is very recommended!!!

Sampler: Euler a, Steps: 40, CFG scale: 5 / DPM++ 2M Karras, Steps: 30, CFG scale: 5

Negative prompt: (worst quality, low quality:1.4), EasyNegative , bad_prompt_version2

Hires.fix: Laten(nearest-exact)/4x-UltraSharp, Hires steps same as Sampling steps, Denoising strength ~0.5, Upscale by 1.5

Used embeddings for sample pictures:

EasyNegative

bad_prompt_version2

Used Lora for the three Watame pictures:

Tsunomaki Watame

If you have any feedback or questions just write in the comments or hit me up on reddit or discord.

meta.prompt:
masterpiece, best quality, absurdres, The blacksmith is a muscular figure with broad shoulders and strong arms, adorned in a leather apron to protect against sparks and flying debris. He stands before his forge, hammer in hand, sweat pouring down his face as he works the heated metal on his anvil.

The forge is a blazing inferno, casting flickering shadows across the smithy. The air is thick with the smell of smoke and the hissing of steam as the blacksmith quenches his work in water to temper it.

The walls of the smithy are adorned with various tools of the trade, including hammers, tongs, and anvils of different sizes. The floor is littered with scrap metal and discarded tools, evidence of the blacksmith's laborious work.

Despite the intense heat and physical strain, the blacksmith is focused and determined, honing his craft with every hammer blow. He is a master of his trade, creating works of art from the raw materials that pass through his hands.
